symptoms: Warning indicator for low hydraulic fluid
diagnostic_steps: Inspect all hose connections and fittings
resolution: Rebuilt hydraulic pump with new seal kit
engineer_notes: Recommend scheduling follow-up inspection in 30 days to verify repair integrity.

diagnostic_steps: Check transmission cooler lines for restriction
root_cause: Worn clutch plates generating excess heat
resolution: Overhauled transmission with new clutch plates and cooler flush
engineer_notes: Parts sourced from emergency stock. Replenishment order required.

symptoms: All electrical systems cut out momentarily
diagnostic_steps: Inspect main battery cables and terminals
Test battery terminal voltage under load
root_cause: Corroded battery terminal causing intermittent connection
resolution: Cleaned and replaced battery terminals and cables
engineer_notes: Root cause linked to environmental exposure. Recommend improved protective measures for electrical components.

symptoms: All electrical systems cut out momentarily
diagnostic_steps: Inspect main battery cables and terminals
Test battery terminal voltage under load
root_cause: Chassis ground strap broken allowing floating ground
resolution: Replaced chassis ground strap and cleaned mounting surfaces
engineer_notes: Recommend scheduling follow-up inspection in 60 days to verify repair integrity.

symptoms: Transmission fault code stored in ECM
diagnostic_steps: Check transmission fluid level and condition
resolution: Overhauled transmission with new clutch packs
engineer_notes: Repair time extended due to limited access in engine bay. Suggest improved tooling for future jobs.

fault_description: No drive in forward or reverse
symptoms: Engine runs normally but vehicle does not move
No engagement felt when selecting gear
Transmission fluid discoloured or has metallic particles
diagnostic_steps: Check transmission fluid level and condition for metal debris
Inspect drive shafts and transfer case
resolution: Replaced torque converter assembly
engineer_notes: Operator reported issue has been recurring for approximately 3 weeks before being logged.

symptoms: Warning indicator for low hydraulic fluid
diagnostic_steps: Inspect all hose connections and fittings
resolution: Rebuilt hydraulic pump with new seal kit
engineer_notes: Root cause linked to environmental exposure. Recommend improved protective measures for hydraulic components.

diagnostic_steps: Check transmission cooler lines for restriction
resolution: Replaced transmission cooler and flushed lines

diagnostic_steps: Read fault codes from ECM and ABS module
Inspect speed sensor and tone ring
Measure sensor output signal with oscilloscope
resolution: Replaced speed sensor and cleared fault codes

symptoms: Visible black smoke at idle and under load

resolution: Replaced cylinder piston seal kit
